projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A selection of my recent development projects that showcase my skills and passion.

factura.description: A comprehensive invoice management system for businesses
factura.longDescription: Factura is a modern invoice management solution that helps businesses streamline their billing process. Built with React and Node.js, it features real-time updates, customizable templates, and detailed reporting.

tourmada.description: Mobile travel guide app for Madagascar
tourmada.longDescription: Tourmada is your pocket guide to Madagascar's wonders. This React Native app offers interactive maps, local recommendations, and cultural insights, making travel planning a breeze.

theologix.longDescription: Theologix is an innovative learning platform dedicated to theological studies. Built with React and MongoDB, it provides interactive courses, discussion forums, and resource libraries.

cta.workTogetherSubtitle: Let's discuss your project and see how I can help you

home.intro: At 18, I'm exploring life through multiple lenses: as a developer, scout leader, and sports enthusiast. Join me in this journey of growth and discovery.

introduction.title: A Journey of Growth and Discovery

paragraphs.personal: I'm Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO, an 18-year-old Malagasy passionate about technology and youth development. Based in Madagascar, I combine my love for development with active involvement in scouting and volleyball.
paragraphs.education: I'm currently pursuing my studies as an AI & MLOps Specialist at ESMIA Antananarivo, combining my technical expertise with my desire to make a positive impact through innovation.
paragraphs.interests: Beyond coding, I find joy in mentoring and playing with children through scouting activities. As a scout leader, I help young people develop valuable life skills. I also find team spirit and energy in playing volleyball.

about.title: About
about.description: Full-Stack developer passionate about modern technologies and artificial intelligence.

seo.description: Learn more about Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO, Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer specialized in React, Next.js, Flutter, Python.
seo.keywords: about, developer, full-stack, AI engineer, React, Next.js, Flutter, Python, experience, skills

intro.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO, a passionate Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer based in Madagascar. I specialize in creating modern web and mobile applications using cutting-edge technologies.
intro.paragraph2: With over 5 years of experience in software development, I've worked on diverse projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to AI-powered applications. I'm particularly passionate about React ecosystem, Flutter for mobile development, and integrating AI solutions.
intro.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

tourmada.title: Full-Stack Web & Mobile Developer (Internship)
tourmada.description: Designed and deployed the Tourmada platform with Django, React, Flutter, PostgreSQL, and Gemini API. Created a comprehensive tourism solution with web and mobile interfaces.

armh.title: Freelance Web Developer
armh.description: Developed responsive websites with UX and basic SEO optimization. Delivered modern web solutions for various clients.

lutherienne.title: IT Manager (Internship)
lutherienne.description: Analyzed production workflows and deployed an optimization system. Managed IT infrastructure and improved operational efficiency.

hackathon.title: AI-Powered Assessment - ESMIA Hackathon 2025
hackathon.description: Created a React/Django prototype with Gemini API to make exams interactive. Developed an innovative assessment platform powered by AI.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about working together

q1.question: What's your typical response time?
q1.answer: I typically respond within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, feel free to call.

q2.question: Do you work with international clients?
q2.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am comfortable across different time zones.

q3.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
q3.answer: I specialize in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Flutter, Python, and AI integration. I'm always learning new technologies.

q4.question: Do you offer ongoing support?
q4.answer: Yes, I provide maintenance and support services for all projects I develop. Let's discuss your needs.

seo.title: Scout - Ihantsa RAKOTONDRANAIVO
seo.description: Discover my commitment to scouting: activities, values and adventures with Scouts, Tily and Imaran Bato.
seo.keywords: scout, scouting, youth, leadership, adventure, nature, Madagascar

hero.title: My Scouting Adventure
hero.subtitle: Scouting has taught me essential values: leadership, teamwork and respect for nature.
hero.mission: Through different branches, I guide young people in their personal development and discovery of the world.
hero.description: Every activity is an opportunity to grow, learn and create bonds that last a lifetime.

scouts.description: Scouts develop their autonomy through outdoor activities, camps and community projects. It's a period of discovery and learning life skills.

tily.description: Tily discover the world through play, exploration and creativity. It's the beginning of the scouting adventure for the youngest, where imagination and friendship are at the heart of every activity.

imaranBato.description: Imaran Bato prepare to become responsible leaders through challenges, service projects and demanding adventures. It's the stage of maturity and commitment.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.subtitle: Enriching experiences that build character and create unforgettable memories

camping.title: Camping & Bivouac
camping.description: Learn to live in harmony with nature, develop autonomy and create strong bonds around the campfire.

hiking.title: Hiking & Exploration
hiking.description: Discover the wonders of Madagascar, build endurance and learn to navigate in nature.

leadership.title: Leadership & Team
leadership.description: Develop leadership skills, learn to work as a team and take responsibility.

games.title: Games & Discovery
games.description: Learn while having fun through educational games that stimulate creativity and imagination.

crafts.title: Crafts & Creativity
crafts.description: Develop dexterity and artistic expression through various manual activities.

nature.title: Nature & Environment
nature.description: Raise awareness about environmental protection and learn to respect biodiversity.

community.title: Community Service
community.description: Engage in projects that have a positive impact on the community and develop civic sense.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Master advanced survival, first aid and project management techniques.

adventure.title: Great Adventures
adventure.description: Take on ambitious challenges that push boundaries and build character.

showcase.title: The Scout Spirit in Action
showcase.description: Every adventure is an opportunity to grow, learn and create memories that last a lifetime.
